remarks: Trace-preserving property of endomorphism sum operation ` P ` , based on theorem ~ trlco .  Part of remark in [Crawley] p. 118, 2nd line, "it is clear from the second part of G (our ~ trlco ) that Delta is a subring of E." (In our development, we will bypass their E and go directly to their Delta, whose base set is our ` ( TEndo `` K ) `` W ` .)  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2013.)
